recipes.title: Classic Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.description: A traditional Italian pasta dish with a rich, hearty meat sauce.
recipes.author: Chef Maria
instructions: In a large skillet, brown the ground beef over medium heat.
Add the onion and garlic, and cook until softened.
Stir in the crushed tomatoes, tomato paste, and oregano. Season with salt and pepper.
Simmer the sauce for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions.
Serve the spaghetti topped with the Bolognese sauce.

recipes.title: Lemon Garlic Roasted Chicken
recipes.description: A flavorful roasted chicken dish infused with tangy lemon and aromatic garlic.
recipes.author: Chef Michael
instructions: Rinse the chicken and pat it dry with paper towels.
Mix the minced garlic, olive oil, thyme, salt, and pepper in a small bowl.
Rub the garlic mixture all over the chicken, including under the skin.
Place the lemon slices inside the chicken cavity.
Roast the chicken for 1 hour 15 minutes or until the juices run clear.
Let the chicken rest for 10 minutes before carving and serving.
